def_cn: (战争中)严密策划的行动;(足球赛中)精心设定的攻防套路
def_en: A set piece is an occasion such as a battle or a move in a game of football that is planned and carried out in an ordered way.

def_cn: (电影、小说或音乐作品中的)固定套路
def_en: A set piece is a part of a film, novel, or piece of music which has a strong dramatic effect and which is often not an essential part of the main story.
